articles.title: Musings on art and culture
articles.description:
A home for thoughts and reflections on anything in 
music, film, society, or the world that captures my interest.

articles.title: Neat data analyses
articles.description:
A place to share my process and findings 
for analyses and algorithms that have yielded interesting insights.

articles.title: Python machine learning demos
articles.description:
A short series of demos using a single dataset to illustrate the application
and versatility of a variety of machine learning algorithms.
Each instalment in the series illustrates one class of supervised, 
unsupervised, or deep learning methods and takes the reader through a 
brief but thorough exploration of considerations regarding their selection, 
performance, and tuning. I draw heavily on the [model_tuning]() (**ipr**)
module of my [mlvis_utils]() (**ipr**) library.

articles.title: Matthew Bain
articles.contents:
Contents
▼ Resources
▼ Analysis
▼ Blog
▼ Music



Hello there! I’m Matt. Above is a picture of the majestic Mount Fuji.
I took this picture and am quite fond of it.
Mount Fuji has been the subject of many great works of art
(e.g., Hokusai’s Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji).
I find myself thinking about these scenes and images often enough that it seemed
fitting to associate this picture with my own creative work.

When I’m not admiring nature and art, I am working with data.
I have a deep fondness for math and machine learning,
and find it thrilling to implement what I learn through code and neat analyses.
I like to write about my favourite projects and discoveries.
I’m sharing some of that here and here.
I also make music on the side – you can find that here.



I am in the process of migrating my work to this site. More
projects and reports will be here soon!

Expand site overview
▼ Resources
► Machine learning tour
A high-level tour of the theory and implementation of machine learning
algorithms in Python.Featured: Supervised learning in Python (draft)
► References & docs
An assortment of tools for working with data, including syntax
reference sheets, high-level outlines, and
checklists.Featured: Technical reports with R Markdown & Bookdown (draft)
► Demos
A short series of demos using a single dataset to illustrate the versatility
and practical application of a variety of machine learning
algorithms.Featured: (In development)
▼ Analysis
A place to share my process and findings for analyses and algorithms
that have yielded interesting insights.Featured: Do extinction rates reflect changing attitudes toward the
environment? (In development)
▼ Blog
A home for my musings on math
(proofs and derivations of my favourite results and algorithms),
machine learning (implementations and simulations), and
everything else (thoughts and reflections on music, film, society, etc.).Featured: Bias-variance decomposition (In development)
▼ Music
An ongoing catalogue of some music I’ve
made.
